text: Are Beyonce & JAY - Z in over their heads? We learned exclusively the 2 didn ’ t expect taking care of twins would be so challenging & since their arrival, they ’ ve ‘ hardly slept! ’ Find out if it ’ s affecting their marriage. While Beyonce, 36, and JAY - Z, 47, have been parents for over five years now, as their five - year - old daughter Blue Ivy was born back in 2012, nothing could have prepared the couple for welcoming twins! In fact, the two apparently have their hands totally full with newborns Rumi and Sir Carter, who were born on June 13.
